name: Beats Runner
description:
Beats Runner is a bite-sized retro-cyberpunk rhythem action platform game. Just follow the beats and rush forward! Caution for the spikes and traps! Rush forward and collect as much stars and coins as possible!Unlock unique characters for more fun, and level up for more challenges!

Challenge your skills and see what you’re capable of!

The gameplay is as simple as one touch jumps and hops. You just need to rush forward in tune with the amazing beats the game offers. Dance your fingers to the adventurously good music.

Game Features
Unique beats
Bite-sized retro-cyberpunk world
Fast-paced action platform
Unlockable characters
20 challenging levels (more to come)

Order pricing and terms
Subscription options:
Premium subscriptions are available after a 3-day free trial. Sign up for $9.99 a week to delete ads, get daily bonuses and low prices.
End of trial period and subscription renewal:
This price is for US customers. Pricing may vary in other countries and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
Payment will be deducted from your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions are automatically renewed unless automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
The account will be charged a renewal fee within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will be renewed.
Subscriptions can be managed by the user and can be turned off by going to the user's account settings after purchase.
Any unused portion of the free trial period (if provided) will be forfeited at the time the user purchases the subscription for the publication (if applicable).
Privacy Policy: https: //furylion.net/privacy-policy/
